quest.name: You Dirty Rats
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol is attempting, unsuccessfully, to close her nostrils.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid natron in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the splendid natron to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid marimo in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the splendid marimo to Qhoterl PasolSpearfish a splendid sponge in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the splendid sponge to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Sometimes I wish I didn't have such a sensitive nose. When the workers come back from the caves, they carry with them the most pungent of odors! It really is quite unbearable!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, even a thorough scrubbing with warm water does little to remove the stench. I fear there is little choice but to resort to a rarely used treatment, and as you can imagine, the ingredients required are also rather rare themselves...

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: First, I'll need roughly three pinches of natron. Your cooperation will be most appreciated, I assure you!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: First, I'll need roughly three marimo. Your cooperation will be most appreciated, I assure you!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: First, I'll need a sponge, the living sort, but you'll need to hook the little scoundrel with your spear as they're far too crafty to take any bait. Your cooperation will be most appreciated, I assure you!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Oh! I forgot to mention that you'll need to dive into the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta to find it!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Oh! I forgot to mention that you'll need to dive into the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta to find them!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: It seems that Lake Tusi Mek'ta is relatively free of large, flesh-eating beasts, so your chances of being devoured alive are actually quite low! Welcome news, I'm sure!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Have you brought what I asked for? Please say you have!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Marvelous! Once the concoction is ready, those reeking reprobates will be the very pinnacle of cleanliness in just a few scrubs!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: At the top of my list of candidates are my husband and son. Their combined stench is enough to curdle milk!
